meanings.definition: To strike or come into contact with forcefully
meanings.sent1: She was hitting the ball with the bat.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys hitting the drums in the band.
meanings.sent3: The clown was hitting the wrong notes on purpose for laughs.
meanings.sent4: His words were hitting her heart like arrows.
meanings.sent5: The storm was hitting the coast with strong winds.

meanings.definition: The act of striking or making contact with something
meanings.sent1: The loud hitting of the hammer echoed in the room.
meanings.sent2: The hitting of the waves against the shore was calming.
meanings.sent3: The hitting of the clock reminded him it was time to leave.
meanings.sent4: The hitting of the basketball against the court was rhythmic.
meanings.sent5: The hitting of the rain on the roof was soothing.
